CustomField.description: [DrawLoop]: Used in WF Outbound Message [Task 11630] DDP = License Face Certificate ; Delivery = SMTP - ODJFS IA Approved & SMTP - ODE IA Approved
CustomField.formula: CASE( RecordType.Name , "Application - CC Center", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgn6", "Application - FCC", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a0335000002RUf0;Deploy:a0135000000kgn6", "Application - ODE Program", "SFCLQ_Program_Transaction__c:" & Id & ";DDPId:a03r0000000xtEJ;Deploy:a01r0000001LWRz", "")
CustomField.label: Drawloop_Next IA Approved
